document.docAuthor: Ji, Ming, Ding, Yufeng & Chen, Jian-Xiu
document.docTitle: Folsomia wanxianesis Ji, Ding & Chen, 2007, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Folsomia (Collembola: Isotomidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Folsomia (Collembola: Isotomidae) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype : female, China : Chongqing: Wanxian, Lihua Village, 252m alt., under stones in the village,
6 .ix. 1998
, collection number C 8639 , coll. Meng Wen-xin et al . Paratypes :
3 females
and
1 male
, the same data as holotype . Deposited in the Department of Biology, Nanjing University.
Description. Body length. Up to 0.62mm. Color. Background color white. Head and body with very scattered blue pigment along sides, pigment on Abd. IV–VI relatively dense.

sp. nov. with other members in quadrioculata- group. Lb = latero-basa, C = central, D = distal, A = apical

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–5.
Folsomia wanxianensis
, sp. nov. : 1, PAO; 2, labral setae; 3, labial setae, px–proximal, bl–basolateral, bm–basomedial, plb–postlabial; 4. Ant. I–III, a. all setae shown, b. only sensilla and microsensilla shown; 5, Ant. IV, a. all setae shown, b. only 6 thickened sensilla shown, c. different types of sensilla, d. common setae.

subSubSection.paragraph: Etymology. The new species is named after Wanxian, the type locality.

Discussion. The new species,
Folsomia wanxianensis ,
belongs to the
quadrioculata
-group and shares some characters with the Eastern Carpathian species
F. albens
Kaprus’ & Potapov 1999 in group, such as the absence of ommatidia, sensilla and microsensilla formulae of Th. II–Abd. III respectively as 4, 3 / 2, 2 , 2, 3 (s) and 1 , 0 / 0, 0, 0 (ms), 6 setae present on posterior side of ventral tube, and small body size. However, it could be easily distinguished from the latter by the laterodistal setae on ventral tube and setae on furca. The differences of the new species from other members of the quadrioculata- group are shown in table 1 .
